net.neto_framework

Class Connection

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.neto_framework.Connection

  • public final class Connection
extends Object
    An interface to send and receive data from TCP and UDP.
    Author:
    BleedObsidian (Jesse Prescott)

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static String MAGIC_STRING
      A magic string that should be within a handshake packet to verify the connection is also using the Neto-Framework.

    • Constructor Summary
